title: Blood Fiend - Theatre of Death (1967 - UK) [Christopher Lee]
description:
Blood Fiend (1967 - UK)                   aka Theatre of Death

Horror / Mystery / Thriller

starring . . . . Christopher Lee, Julian Glover, Lelia Goldoni
 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0062358/


Welcome to the Theatre of Death in Paris, where a troupe of young actors specialize in gore-drenched Grand Guignol plays directed by the cruel and domineering Phillipe Darvas. But when a series of horrific murders plague the city, the trail of bodies leads directly to the theatre and its cast of the damned. Is the sinister Darvas responsible for the gruesome crimes, or is the stage set for an even more ghastly surprise?


Video: MPEG4 Video (H264), 720x360, 29.970 fps, 1410 Kbps, 01h29m34s
Audio: Dolby AC3, 48000 Hz, stereo, 192 kbps

DVDRip, English audio, optional subtitles French and Spanish
